definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

sentences.english: This little blond moppet, gentle and kind and interested in the world.
sentences.chinese: 這個金髮的小娃娃，溫順而友好，對世界充滿了興趣。

sentences.english: A young blonde was on vacation in the depths of Louisiana.
sentences.chinese: 一位年輕的金髮女郎在路易斯安那州中部度假。

sentences.english: Blond - haired blue - eyed Westerners also come for a look-see .
sentences.chinese: 金髮碧眼的洋人也來探個究竟。

sentences.english: He would sometimes be accompanied by the slim, fair-haired court pages .
sentences.chinese: 有時候還有幾個金髮苗條的內侍陪伴他。

sentences.english: Fund launched to the impact of second-line blue-chip, this do not want to go.
sentences.chinese: 基金髮起的二線藍籌股，這不希望去影響。

sentences.english: Before the golden tresses of the dead.
sentences.chinese: 當時死者的金髮葬在墓冢。
金髮的女孩，那是羅莎莉。

sentences.english: Will you Strike it Lucky, catch Gold Fever or be left bankrupt?
sentences.chinese: 你會行使其瑞，撈金髮熱或留待破產嗎？

sentences.english: Of course, real?life blonds don't fit neatly into this taxonomy.
sentences.chinese: 當然現實生活中女人的金髮很難完全符合這些類型。

sentences.english: In older women though, going blonde may speed up the greying process.
sentences.chinese: 但年長的女性如果漂染金髮可能會加速白髮的生成。

sentences.english: Women used mullein flowers in order to bring out the golden highlights in their hair.
sentences.chinese: 女人們用毛蕊花來提亮她們的金髮。
難道傳說中的金髮女孩是瑞典人？

sentences.english: So Marilyn dyed her brunette hair to a golden blonde.
sentences.chinese: 這樣瑪裏琳把她的黑褐色頭髮染成了金髮碧眼。

definition: one head/a head full of sth/one end (of a stick)/one side/headlong/directly/rapidly/simultaneously
